content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0) with a drop chest at (x=-14.5, y=-48.5)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (x=-13.0, y=-48.0), (x=-11.0, y=-48.0), and (x=-9.0, y=-48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (x=-16.5, y=-48.5), (x=-15.5, y=-48.5), (x=-13.5, y=-49.5), (x=-18.5, y=-48.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (x=-14.5, y=-48.5), (x=-12.5, y=-49.5), (x=-9.5, y=-49.5)
- The furnaces are supplied with iron ore from the mining drill and produce iron plates.

### Coal Storage and Transfer System
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) with a drop chest at (x=41.5, y=-80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (x=41.5, y=-80.5), (x=42.5, y=-80.5), (x=44.5, y=-80.5), (x=45.5, y=-80.5), (x=47.5, y=-80.5), (x=49.5, y=-80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=43.5, y=-80.5), (x=41.5, y=-78.5)
- This system transfers coal to storage and supplies fuel to the furnaces.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting but being too far
- Ensure you are close enough to the target entity before attempting to extract items.

### Errors when clearing drop chests
- Make sure the drop chest is not full before attempting to clear it. Empty it if necessary.

### Errors when extracting from storage
- Verify that the storage contains the items you are trying to extract. If extraction fails, check the inventory of the storage.

### Errors when transferring items to furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has available space and the correct ingredients before transferring items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
